headers.subject: [tosdr:1761] empty terms of services

html:
I am new to this list and the question might be out of the scope. It's a question that I asked Jan-Christoph, but he didn't have an answer. He suggested me to post the question on this list. Please flag it if it's off-topic.

Suppose I start a web service, say a social network, or a blog platform (I don't have a real example in mind).
Now suppose I am too lazy to write a terms of service page, so I leave it empty.
I consider this a "default" case. What would be the rating of tos;dr in for my service?

Thanks,
Alessandro


--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---
